ygData.subject: RE: Wishful thinking
ygData.msgSnippet: I like it but I don t think it would make it past Verant! It would be cool though!
ygData.messageBody:
I like it but I don't think it would make it past Verant!
It would be cool though!

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Nick Emmerich [mailto:seorin@...]
>Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 3:56 PM
>To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Wishful thinking
>
>From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
>
>Well, in the midst of all the flames, I wanted to make a friendly happy
>sort of a post. Please, nobody argue with this, it would defeat the
>entire purpose of this post. I won't even respond if this gets flamed,
>and I would hope nobody else will either. Anyway, here goes:
>
>I just thought it'd be a neat idea to have 'name tags' on trade-made
>products. Maybe not for cooking or brewing, as those items aren't meant
>to last, but on generally anything else. Something in the status window
>that says, "made by: name". Wouldn't that just be neat? Buy a banded
>tunic 6 months from now with one of your secondary characters and say,
>"hey! I made that!!" I'm not saying it's even possible for them to code
>this, nor do I expect or really even want them to. I just think it's
>kinda neat, that's all :) Too much coding for the effect it would
>produce (or should I say lack of effect =P). Just, as I said, neat :)
>-Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM
>
>
